awards:
第22届哥谭独立电影奖(2012)
　　最佳突破导演奖(提名) 杰森·科尔特朗德 / 朱莉亚·哈尔佩林

director.name: 杰森·科尔特朗德 Jason Cortlund
朱莉亚·哈尔佩林 Julia Halperin

this_title: Now, Forager: A Film About Love & Fungi
trans_title: 注意，物种蔓延中！：爱与菌类之歌
introduction: A couple are picking wild mushrooms to sell to chic restaurants. One of them offers her a job. While her culinary star is rising, their relationship goes downhill. The film, which cleverly latches onto the foraging trend, cuts through the love tragedy with poetic portraits of mushrooms.A couple lives off picking wild mushrooms. They get up before dawn, set off into the woods a...
chinese_title: 注意，物种蔓延中！：爱与菌类之歌
foreign_title: Now, Forager: A Film About Love & Fungi
